website_summaries.verdict: Made with the heaviest of industrial applications in mind, this steel toe boot offering work boot durability with athletic shoe comfort.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These boots run very narrow. They hurt my feet and knees after 4 hours. The cushioning isnt bad but the foot doesnt mold naturally.high arches. Huge waste of money on girly steel toe boots. I wish retailers worked with women designers for better fit. My Doc Martens are way better fitting and cheaper. I can wear those for 14 hours. I tried these Cats for a week in the metal fab shop. They hurt more everyday. Thumbs down. Bummed out. Just spent 150 bux down the toilet
customer_reviews.author: ROGUE

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love them!! Comfortable and fit perfect!! 👍 I ordered my normal size and they fit great!! I am usually a 6 or 6 1/2 I ordered the 6 and I'm glad I did!! The color is very nice too! I got the grey and it looks very nice! Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Harmony A.Top Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Not cute enough for the pain
customer_reviews.text: Super cute boots. Unfortunately tore my feet up. I still have em because the return policy is not that friendly. Maybe I will try em again when my feet have healed up from the bleeding sores caused by these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C.

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart before 2 months passed!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality!! They seem very lovely at first, but I’ve not even had these for 2 months and the back is completely ripped out of the shoe (I had noticed the seem was very sloppily stitched together where it runs against the heel when they were new), and stitching in the outside is coming undone as well after getting wet. I work in a barn, I thought these were good but they’re crap. If you work in a barn too, I advise you not to waste your hard earned dollars on these poorly stitched shoes, it’s throwing your money away. I’m off to buy new shoes again now.. from someone else clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: 12 days of work and they're already coming apart.
customer_reviews.text: The first 8 days were a break-in period for me. My feet were dying. The following 3 days were good. The twelfth day, my feet started hurting again in different places. I removed my boots to find holes on the fabric inside corresponding to the new pain points on my feet. The fabric is obviously weak. It rolled up around the edge of the holes and some transferred/pilled on to my socks. I'm so disappointed and feel rather swindled. Caterpillar only excepts returns within 45 days of purchase and only if they haven't been worn. Just great...
customer_reviews.author: B. dale

customer_reviews.title: They are incredibly comfortable and functional
customer_reviews.text: I am editing my review to comment on how well these have held up over time. I’ve had them for two years, I wear them all the time in all sorts of construction/shop environments, and they’re still in great shape and very comfortable. The color doesn’t last too well though, but that’s my only complaint. I cannot say enough about these boots. They are incredibly comfortable and functional. They aren't big and clunky the way that men's steel toed boots are. I get compliments on them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Great pair for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing these shoes while I work at a factory and then weld in the mornings for over a year now. Obvious wear and tear but they've done just fine. For the job I work they've done perfectly well, may buy another pair when I shift departments so I don't bang them up so much, but still have a lot of life left.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Honest, actual work boot review.
customer_reviews.text: Following other reviews I ordered up a half size. Perfect fit with thicker socks. VERY light weight, which is what I personally need being that I work on my feet all day in industrial construction. Good tread and so far water resistant with the scotch guard. I did have blisters on the heal after day one and sore toes. However, ordered DR. Scholls socks from here and no more issues. Thicker insoles needed as well. But, little fixes are well worth the lack of heavy feet at the end of a 10/12 hr workday.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Durable work boot - short term.
customer_reviews.text: Hard on my heels, but so far holding up. I'll update at the end of my work season if they hold up. So far i'm not bleeding anywhere and my feet don't ache after 14 hours in them. Far better then other boots i've paid more for. ** update** I bought these in April and it's September now, they are tearing up my ankles even with heavy boot socks. I will not be buying these again. As soon as I can I'll be buying work boots elsewhere from a different brand. Sure would be nice to make April through October not bleeding because my footwear wom't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite utility boots
customer_reviews.text: I have issues with my feet and am always anxious about breaking in new shoes and boots. These boots were comfortable straight from the box, and properly supportive. I purchased them as hiking boots because they're higher (mid-calf), the soles are made for better grip--think all-terrain tires, they are likely to better handle abuse, and they can work double-duty as I often need to go into manufacturing shops where steel toes are required. Vanity note: I love that these were available in colors other than black and tan.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful they run big
customer_reviews.text: I like these boots. They're great quality but they run big. Originally got size 6 in women's and had to return them because they were way too big all over, mostly in the toes and length. Reordered for a size 5 and 1/2 which unfortunately were now too small just about all over. My heels hurt really bad for the first week as I was trying to break them in. They are still super cute nonetheless and serve their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: alexandra smith

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased boots for work...not even 8 weeks after purchase and the inside material @ the heel is already wore out...spent way to much money for these boots to have them state falling apart literally days after use! Won't purchase again from cat! Furthermore...I will not get all of my return purchase money back, to the tune of over $40. This was by far the worst purchase on amazon I have ever made...and I understand it is not amazon's fault the fault lies with cat...if there was a zero star that's what cat would be getting from me.
customer_reviews.author: bc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to work on cleaning out and up a house for sale. After trying to load a dumpster and having my husband nearly miss my toes a few times I looked at what could be delivered my 8 am and picked these out. They have exceeded my expectations. I wore them for over 12 hours most of which was on my feet right out of the box. They have been extremely comfortable and very waterproof esp working on the yard in the rain. The 12 hour days are still going but without complaint from my feet and my have toes have been safe.
customer_reviews.author: A Burlingame

customer_reviews.title: 4 weeks of 12 hr shifts later,  still look great and feel good!
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a month now. They are fantastic boots. I was suprised how comfortable these boots are, and they have worn very well. They are very sturdy. I get compliments all the time on them and people want to know where I bought them. Even after 4 weeks of hard work and abuse on 12 hour shifts they still look almost new, just some scuffing, and other employees boots are falling apart in the same time period. Definately worth the money. Your feet will thank you. Will buy these again if this pair ever wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews for these boots were so extreme in both directions, I really couldn't get a good sense of what to expect. I must say, that I wore them 16 hrs a day, for 11 days straight and I am so happy I went for it! As with most steel-toed boots, there was a little bit of rubbing and blisters in the first few days of breaking them in at home. I found some tough blister bandaids that I put on fresh each day, and had no further issues! The color is nice, the fit is great...no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: E & M

customer_reviews.title: but when I could it was fine to lace them up all the way
customer_reviews.text: To be expected, must be broken in. Wore them for one day only partially laced and ankles were bruised for a few days. Couldn't wear again for a week, but when I could it was fine to lace them up all the way. By the third or fourth time, it was much more bearable and I should soon be able to wear them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy G.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The left boot has a weird fold on the tongue that hurts my ankle and makes it difficult to wear. It's also less purple than the right shoe for some reason. I want to like these boots but the left one is messed up.
customer_reviews.author: GreenHair

customer_reviews.title: Great work boots
customer_reviews.text: We bought these boots as motorcycle/everyday autumn boots for my 9 y.o. daughter (size 5). They fit great. Quality is top notch - materials, stitching. Much better than comparable in price Dr. Martens. Color choice would be strange for adult, but fits ideally for pre-teen. She's especially excited for metal toe caps in hypothetical encounters with boys at school
customer_reviews.author: Sergii Kovalchuk

customer_reviews.title: These are nice quality boots
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality boots. They fit as expected but do have a break-in period. After a couple days of 10 hour wear they started to hurt around my ankles. The shaft of these is very stiff so that can start to hurt your Achilles' tendon in certain positions (if you drive several hours the gas pedal Achilles will start to hurt). Otherwise I really like these boots and the color is different and eye-catching. They are definitely water resistant but if you stand in water your feet will start to feel damp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The worst boot known to man
customer_reviews.text: The most uncomfortable work boot I’ve ever worn. I gave it a few weeks of painful blisters to break them in, but It’s been a month and a half and I’m still getting new blisters and now my one toe looks like a mangled piece of meat. Must destroy immediately and find something better. Do not purchase if you work 40+ hours in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable . It's my first time ordering shoes online . There is limited choices where I live for steel toes for women so I thought I'd take a chance and order online . I normally get size 7 1/2 regular width . But I ordered these 7 1/2 wide . I'm glad I did they run a bit narrow in the toe . The heel is a little wide so I put heel pads in for a day. Now they are fine without them. I work 12 hr shifts on cement . So far 4 days and they're still comfortable . I will be getting them again . Plus I like the color .
customer_reviews.author: Pheonix

customer_reviews.title: Harsh on heel
customer_reviews.text: I honestly loved these boots at first they are light weight, and cute. However they rubbed against my heel something terrible. I talked to another girl at work with the same one's. She said she had the same problem until they were broke in. Beware! I've had meny steel toes in my life nothing that hurt that bad. If you decide to go with them make sure you keep your old pair you will probably be needing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, you can bend your foot and good for those who get cramps in their feet regularly.
customer_reviews.text: By far the best and most comfortable steel toe boots I've ever owned. They are soft and I can bend my foot comfortably, all the other steel toe boots I have cause so much pain after wearing them for hours. Plus to me they're are safer when climbing ladders and / or stairs. Beside being comfortable, they look great! I keep getting compliments, some can't even believe that they're safety boots. I have the grey, and I'm considering getting the blue color too.
customer_reviews.author: shimaa A taher

customer_reviews.title: Overall a decent boot
customer_reviews.text: The boots seem to be of decent quality. I made the mistake of wearing low/no show socks while doing yard work with them on. The sock on my right foot must have moved down and I got an instant wicked blister on the back of my right heel. Took days to heal. These boots are quite stiff in the ankle until you break them in. I like the color. Mine are like a cross between lavender and pewter. I do notice my foot tip tends to slip off the brake/gas pedal while driving with these. Maybe I just need to get used to them.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof even though it says it on the shoe
customer_reviews.text: These state they are waterproof but they are not. Do not waste your money on these if you need waterproof shoes. My feel are soaked daily and I am disappointed in this quality. On the plus side I work in a food manufacturing warehouse and wear there’s 12-14 hours a day and they are really comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Urick

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These are good boots. Put them through the wringer in my construction landscaping job and they’ve held up really well. They are tough. They’ve done everything I’ve asked of them except one thing; be super comfortable. As for comfort, I bought new insoles and can now work all day in them. For around $100, they are a good work boot. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J C.

customer_reviews.title: Not slip resistant
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a cute steel toe boot. It’s kinda heavy and as some of the other reviewers mentioned the shoe laces aren’t long enough to tie the boot all the way. Very disappointed this boot claims to be slip resistant however not so much. I slipped a few times on a slick floor and almost broke my neck. So that’s a huge turnoff for me. I was happy I went with a boot because a colleague hit my foot with a ladder and fortunately I couldn’t feel it.
customer_reviews.author: Kishia

customer_reviews.title: Marlin is blue not purple
customer_reviews.text: I'm not using this boot for work so I can't testify as to durability or comfort during prolonged use. It's cute and sturdy. My only complaint is the marlin color appears purple in the image.(which I wanted) . In reality it's a blueberry color. More blue That was my only disappointment. If it weren't such a pain, I'd return. I'm glad I got them for a reduced price.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Agony for your feet
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my feet are weird, but literally nothing has ever caused me such foot pain as these boots. I was willing to pay over $150 since this was a name brand and I expected them to be great. What a huge mistake and waste of money. I’d include a picture of my bare feet after a 10 hour shift, but it’s just too gross. Thank goodness my go-to sketchers arrived quickly enough to save my job. V
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and lightweight work boot
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a pair of steel toe docs for work and so far they're great. After one day I felt they were pretty well broken in and were surprisingly lightweight for steel toes. I love the unique color and would definitely recommend them and buy them again. I did leave the top hook untied as when done all the way up they were a bit restrictive of movement at the ankle.. but with that one small change I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect heavy duty boots
customer_reviews.text: It's so hard to find women's work boots that are feminine, sturdy and last a long time. So many times I've bought cheap work boots and the heel comes loose or the inside rips. I splurged and got these boots and I love them. They're waterproof which is great for the winter. They fit perfect and they look nice! Worth the money (they were on sale here for $79 at one point).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these, they are so cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they are so cute and comfortable. I didn't give five stars because the leather scratched up in DAYS of getting them even though I double waterproofed them and was what I thought was pretty careful. I'm talking like scratches IN the leather not on. Other than that they have held up through all kinds of weather and abuse. You DO need to break them in. Do not wear all day right away. I did and I was in so much pain I thought I had seriously hurt my knee. Now they're one of my most comfortable pairs of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: H. Pitzrick

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Boots but make my feet look huge.
customer_reviews.text: Have to admit when I first wore them they gave me blister on my heels. I put band-aids on my heels and broke them in. after that I haven't had a problem. they are very comfortable, I use them at work where I do a lot of walking pushing and lifting and climbing on concrete floors. They've held up very well so far. I don't wear them everyday but, when I do they work for what I bought them for. I bought a size9 wear a 9. They do make my feet look huge.
customer_reviews.author: Cyber shopper

customer_reviews.title: Functional work boot
customer_reviews.text: This pair is made with high quality materials. Feels very sturdy and stable when I have them on. They are a bit too heave for me because I am small person, but I will get use to it the more I use them on construction site. Other than performance, they look fantastic on, not bulky like other work boots I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out as hoped. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these. I ordered the grey ones and they look like a lilac purple. Putting them on they were very comfortable at the ankle with lots of support and cushion. The toe area was smaller than expected and I've never worn wide size in my life so I just ordered the standard size. I returned these due to the color not being actually grey, toe width wasn't roomy enough and the fact that my feet got VERY hot in these. They don't breathe well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lis

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped for in a womens work boot.
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a seriously rugged and protective work boot and found these gems. Made by CAT, I knew they would have to be great quality and they were. Along with the steel toe boot and waterproof design, they are comfortable enough to wear 8 - 10 hours at a time. I have also received many compliments on these boots as well. Durable yet feminine attractive design, these boots are a gem for hard working women.
customer_reviews.author: MBeverly

customer_reviews.title: Working in style!
customer_reviews.text: Came just as described and I have received so many compliments in just the one week I have been wearing them. I work for USPS so I wanted a hardy leather work boot that still reflected my style. So far the quality seems great and i love the grayish color. I was a bit concerned about breaking them in first but ended up just wearing them for a full days work with no issue, they are actually comfier than i had expected. I did order a half size up to ensure I had room for thicker socks which worked out perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable boot except for steel toe
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most comfortable boots I've worn. I work in the woods, so have to walk a lot on unlevel ground and climb over trees laid over. The boot is tight to the heel, so unlike others, I have not gotten a blister. I've gotten a lot of compliments about how "slick" the boot looks and love the fact there you can buy a boot in a color other than black or brown. The only compliant is the steel toe box that digs in the top of my foot when driving or sitting. I think that's pretty typical of most steel to boots, so it helps to wear thicker wool socks (even in the summer).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these!! Just got them today and they look exactly like the picture shown. They are light, even with the steel toe, and have somewhat of a memory foam bottom. The only problem I have is I have to wear high socks to help protect my little ankles! Lol but Definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha K.

customer_reviews.title: Great, cute work boot!
customer_reviews.text: I work for a beer distributor so steel toes are necessary when I’m out in the market. I also need to be halfway fashionable. I’ve had these about 3 weeks and now that I’m past the breaking-in period, I love them! They’re comfortable and warm (I’m in Colorado) and I’ve received tons of compliments on them. I have the Frost color to go with black, brown, and navy and they’re perfect. I have already scuffed the toes some which is why I took away a star, but at the end of the day, they’re work boots and they’re meant to protect my toes from kegs, glass, metal, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Richard

customer_reviews.title: Long and narrow, not good for footwear.
customer_reviews.text: I had to wait over a week and a half to find out their size 7W fits more like a 8.5M. My toes barely reached the steel-toe portion of the boot, and they're tighter than my 7M hiking boots. I wish i could report on the actual durability and style, but they are unwearable until I can replace them. Hopefully a shorter version doesn't mean narrower.
customer_reviews.author: Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Stood up against a 360 mower
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. My neighbor ran over my foot with a 360 mower, it took off the top leather but my foot is fine and the shoe is still doing it's job. Definitely protected my foot. I will buy another pair! Also as a beekeeper and do alot of projects, so I needed boots that were well fitted around my ankles and my feet protected. I feel alot more safe having these boots on.
customer_reviews.author: Corbow6

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes that conform to steel toe ANSI standards
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoes! I haven't had a chance to wear them for a full day yet, so I don't know about comfort, but they're great work boots. I've been having a lot of difficulty finding ANSI-approved women's steel toe shoes, so these were a godsend. They're very "ruggedly feminine", as one of my friends put it. My only complaint so far is that the pair I got (Frost Gray) is more gray than frost, and so ends up looking kind of dull under interior lighting. However, that's a purely aesthetic complaint; so far the boots have held up great in a functional capacity. If I experience any comfort problems or quality complaints, I will return and update.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: These boots are very comfortable. Took me a day to get use to ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very comfortable. Took me a day to get use to them, but after that they feel great. They also keep me warm, I’ve used them in the snow when shoveling and they did awesome. I am usually a 37.5 in size, which is a 6.5 in the chart. I ordered 7.5 cause I figured that with the steel toe, too tight would hurt my toes. Plus, it’s better if I want to use thicker socks too. The size is perfect. They are a little bigger (cause I bought them bigger) but they are more comfortable like that. So I would say size is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Majerus

customer_reviews.title: The Best Women's Steel Toe Boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these due to needing a steel toe option for going into facilities with shoe requirements. They are a very attractive shoe, have received a ton of compliments on wearing them. They are comfortable, didn't have to go through a long process of "breaking" them in. They are great to wear all day. Only thing you have to watch out is when you drive, little extra pep in your step.
customer_reviews.author: donald reynard

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Back in the day I was a big doc martens fan. These are just as good if not better. I am a big girl and it's hard to find shoes that don't make my feet hurt at the end of an 8 hour day of standing. These are it. And they are purple! Only thing better would be a butterfly on them, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E. Witt

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Work Boots Hold Up Well
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I have to lug around heavy objects at work, so steel toed boots are required. It's very hard to find my size locally and these were definitely a good buy. I've had them for a few months now and they're holding up great. I have managed to take a few small chunks out of the suede, but that's to be expected with my job. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Perry

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I started working at Aldi’s and I needed shoes with the f-2413-11. I read all the reviews on these pair which really helped with me finally purchasing these. All the reviews are correct get half a size up so I’m a 5 so I got a 5.5 and it feels comfy fits perfect. My feet don’t really sweat in them which is a plus for me! I don’t have anything bad to say about them except for the fact that black pair in 5.5 were out of stock which is the one I wanted. Anyways highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like my new gardening boots. Very efficient and during summer my feet are not overheating like crazy. Make sure you put a taller sock as they might feel a little rough on your ankle. Overall, I am satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Florina

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof, but cute.
customer_reviews.text: It says waterproof in the headline, they are not. They got damages pretty soon from when I purchased them (because I needed them to be waterproof). The reason I'm giving 2 stars is because they looked cute when they got here but after a week of use, they should be tossed. If you don't really need them to be waterproof then it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Carla J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit amazing. Comfortable out of the box. Lightweight. Durable!! For someone who has a hard time finding a good fit in foot wear, it is nice to finally find a women’s boot that works all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toe way too tight
customer_reviews.text: Very cute boot have gotten several complements but the fabric around the metal on the toe wore out after only wearing less than a month plus toe is way too tight have not been able to heal the blisters between my toes and i don't work 5 days a week i only work 3-4 days a week so this should not of happened already especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly d.

customer_reviews.title: Best work shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great and durable! I love the look, I think they are beautiful! (I work in a cheese factory so they are not pretty anymore, but still) Definitely waterproof. I use them in water on a regular basis and I have no wet socks to speak of!
customer_reviews.author: Renaa

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever! Pretty much my favorite shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for work and these are pretty much my favorite pair of shoes!!! I can't believe how comfortable they are!!! The steel toe doesn't dig into your toes like other brands, and I love the grey color! They also make my feet look small and fashionable on the work site. I wear a size 9. Very happy. Would buy again but they are so well made that I don't think they will die anytime soon. Good job Caterpillar! You guys went above and beyond on this one! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SW Biologist

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, cute and true to size
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots they’re more comfortable than tennis shoes, I wore tennis shoes at my old job On concrete floors 8 hours a day and my heels would kill me at the end of the day. I’ve wore these boots 3 days in a row at work and my feet do not hurt when I get off work!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Smith

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable :)
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots took a few days of hard wear to break in ( and a few good blisters lol) but even before they were broken in they were super comfortable and was able to work a full day in brand new boots with only a blister at my heels. The color is so pretty and I love that I can have unique looking boots when everyone else has black or tan. So far well worth the 100$ I spent on them
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Loved them so much at first, but I have worn these boots for 2 months and they are already falling apart on the toes and on the inside rubbing my heels raw. I'm tough on my shoes because of my farm work but for this price, they should last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Unique!
customer_reviews.text: I got so many compliments on the job site and at work wearing these! They are very comfortable. As expected, I got a bit of a blister on my heel the first day so I recommend wearing double socks (which I usually do) but I wore them 9 hours and only felt like taking them off after a full 8 hours. They fit great!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Wide too narrow for only slightly wider feet.
customer_reviews.text: I dont wear a wide in Keens or any other shoes but got 10W in these based on reviews. The wide was way too narrow in the toe!!! I can't even say how good the arch support was or anything else because I tried on the 10W and it was way too tight in the toe. Also delivery was super late so I didnt have them in time for a project and had to wear my Keen winter hiking boots for a project in the summer heat! I'll be buying a pair of Keen work boots and using insoles for arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but do not last long.
customer_reviews.text: The boots were very comfortable at first and I loved them! They look super cute and I received a lot of compliments. After 5 months they started coming apart on the inside. I work 55 hours a week and walk on concrete floors. For the money I paid for these I thought they would last a lot longer than they did. I can no longer wear them because it hurts my feet horribly even walking short distances. I had to start putting band-aids on the back of my heels/ankles until I got a new pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BE FOOLED!! DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: For these shoes be so expensive, I expected much better quality! Had return them, not something I can wear for 8 hours a day!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Griner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, fantastic quality boot, but too narrow! (for me)
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, quality boot, but my wide feet can't handle the squeeze, so buy wide, if there's too much room, wear thicker socks. Otherwise, wonderful construction. Very impressive. Glad quality products are still made in this day and age. Fantastic product & beautiful classy color, different, but not too different. Meets all the expectations for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Mess

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful working gal boot.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are fabulous! I work in construction, mud, rain, concrete work; you name it, I’m in it. I needed boots that were up for the job too. I’ve had these for 3 weeks now and they are holding up like a champ. The first day it took a bit for them to loosen up, but now they are really comfortable. I’m sure they will last all winter— I wouldn’t expect more than that of any shoe/boot since I’m so rough on them. If you’re a working gal looking for a good boot — this one is great!
customer_reviews.author: Essence W.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy AND comfortable supportive boot.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these boots for keeping toes safe & supported while hiking 🥾 and for work. Did not have to “break them in” for proper fit. My healthy un- blistered heels thank Cat.and will be ordering from them instead of former Doc Martin.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, so far.
customer_reviews.text: So, I just got them today, however after trying them on, I'm glad i spent the money. The heels inside have squishy stuff and they seem comfortable. I chose these because a flatbed driver, I never know what might on the ground where I'm loading and some places wont even allow us to to get out of the truck with out steel toes shoes. So I'm excited to put them to the test. But so far I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little narrow, but overall great boots
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing these boots for about two months now. I work at a shipyard and spend up to 12 hours a day on my feet. These took about a week to break in. I ordered a wide size (I am normally somewhere in between a regular and wide) and am very glad that I did. After the first day or two, I was worried that they were still too narrow for me, but they broke in well and fit perfectly now. The color is perfect, unique but not obnoxious, and I get compliments on them all the time! Very comfortable and so far they seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Love how comfortable these boots are!
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of steel toe boots. They are incredibly comfortable and don't have that typical "clunky" appearance or feel. I often forget that I am even wearing steel toes (I literally get compliments on these boots if I wear them grocery shopping after work)! These boots fit to size for me; although, I do have a narrow-er foot. I have had these boots for almost a month. I work with chemicals, which has created some disturbances with the fabric over the toe, so I would just suggest spraying them with some sort of protective coating if possible. I'm hoping this doesn't decrease their "life" because they're definitely not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa C

customer_reviews.title: These felt Great. I was on a road job averaging 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: These felt Great. I was on a road job averaging 10 hour days 6 days a week working near concrete & asphalt, rocks, dirt, etc. I'm hard on shoes and these made it about 8 months which is pretty good for me.. I've had others only last 1. If they made it a year I would have given 5 stars I would definitely recommend these comfortable boots again. Oh, I forgot to mention the color really looked good too.
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: New work boots for the wife
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife because she wanted them. She absolutely loves them and says they’re very comfortable especially for being on her feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jungle Brutality

customer_reviews.title: Superstar Stylish Steel Toes
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I have narrow feet so they fit perfectly with thick socks, absolutely comfortable from the beginning. I'm a new engineering intern and these are so beautiful, everyone notices them. They are a gorgeous purply blue, water repellant and lightweight, the other women didn't know you could get styling steel toed boots!
customer_reviews.author: A.M. A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! They didn't hurt at all when breaking them in. However, I did wear thick wool socks. I've had these for 3 months now and they're awesome. I'm in between a size 7.5 and an 8. I was soooo scared I was going to get the wrong size. I went ahead and got an 8 and I'm so glad that I did because you need room to wear thick socks. if you don't wear thick socks then your feet will hurt!. Only con is that they scuff easily and wont stay they pretty grey color for long.
customer_reviews.author: Anabel Camarena

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey. Not very well made.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots but it didn't take long for them to wear down. After only a few months they are no longer waterproof and the rubber sole in the back is beginning to tear apart. I still wear them as I feel I have to considering I spent so much money on them..
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Best Purple boots ever!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing boots. Took a while to get them but well worth it. I work in a warehouse after having multiple leafsprings land on my toes I had to invest in steal toe. There about a half size bigger then expected which are how steal toe boots should fit. Just enough room for whool socks! Light arch support,ones with high arches would recommend adding a better insole. But by far the best thing of all... they are PURPLE!!! 💜💜💜
customer_reviews.author: alysia

customer_reviews.title: Boot exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: Love the color; the height over ankle for support; arch support; easy to clean material; definayely water resistant; solid boot... Easy to wear out right after receiving...no break-in time period required.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Steel placement is not for me!
customer_reviews.text: The steel to is only in the front of the shoe. I needed something on the top front for my line of work. The steel positioning makes my foot look extra big. These are not my favorite. The seller was great though I got the shoes promptly and they were in perfect condition. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: D. Coles Rudolph

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Im a size 7.5 and bought a size 8 they fit a little big but i do use double socks i work in wind farm construction but other then the sizes i threw water on then because they are water proof and they actually are like no joke super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Comfort for 12+ Hours
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable steel toes I've ever worn! Well worth the money. I walk/stand on concrete for 8 to 12 hours a day and these have held up very well in the month I've had them. The color is cute and there is no "breaking in" needed. They were a great fit and super comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Miller

customer_reviews.title: I love love love these
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so amazing. Im an arborist apprentice. We're up in trees all day. These boots are so comfortable. I get home and sometimes forget to take them off. Great boots.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Porch

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic work boots
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I’ve bought. The boot on the right is from the pair I’ve had for just over a year. They break in quickly and are phenomenal work boots. I wore mine everday including snow removal and salting and they held up well. If you are a half size I would order up. I also purchased heel snugs to use with them because I’m prone to heel blisters and that made them very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe9500

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I only got these shoes recently due to working in the foundry and requiring steel toed boots. They fit exactly how I wanted them to and wore in very quickly! They are very comfortable and while somewhat still, are also very sturdy. They also look very good so I can feel presentable when I have to leave work wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the shoe box!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to work as seasonal crew at UPS. Great addition and I now wear in my everyday life. Comfortable fit - true to size and great support. I had NO foot or leg pain breaking them in and they allowed me to work in a very heavy wear environment in comfort. Highly recommend for someone that needs safety and comfort in one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are exactly what I needed. They broke in quickly and they fit perfectly. Where I work, there’s a lot of wet floors and uneven ground and I’ve never slipped or gotten my feet wet. I’ve also gotten lots of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and stylish. No blisters on toes or heels during break in, only a bit higher up on my ankle because they're taller than my last pair. I now work 12+ hrs on concrete without achy feet. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rita P.

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: The best work boots I have ever purchased. Absolutely fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: mary f spano

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, cute boots
customer_reviews.text: Color exactly as shown. I was a bit nervous that it looked narrower than my last boots but they are comfortable and I have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Williams

customer_reviews.title: Don’t last long :(
customer_reviews.text: I loved the boots; however they did not last. The sole of the boot started coming apart about a month after purchasing them and have now almost completely separated, despite only wearing them when working which was less frequent then I would usually be working due to my owning them over the holiday period and with COVID-19. Was really hoping they would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Emily MacKillop

customer_reviews.title: Painful to break in but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: A little narrow so my foot pushed the side over the seem a little bit, but otherwise holding up great 2 months of vigorous use later. Painful to break in, took about a month but once they were broken in they're the most comfortable boots I've had in many years, even being slightly too narrow. They look like they'll last a lot longer too.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size advertise
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size wide do to I have a metal slate on my left foot I couldn't fit it. It is neural then what they say... I love the look of the boot and I wish it would have fit. But I had to return it I don't understand how they can label it wide it was not
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Molina

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are nice and seem to be a really good combination of steel toe and water/weather proof. I haven't worn them for an extended period of time yet but they were comfy out of the box. I usually wear a 7.5 in shoes and that's what I ordered and they fit great, even with thick socks on.
customer_reviews.author: Book Jedi

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Just received today and I absolutely love them. Fit is great and love the color. I have to wear steel toe boots at my work place and was thrilled to find boots with some color. Would recommend this product and seller to any woman wanting to add some color to their work outfit.
customer_reviews.author: doodle

customer_reviews.title: They fit great. I have a bit of a narrow foot
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7.5-8 normally, but decided to buy an 8 just because of the steel toe. They fit great. I have a bit of a narrow foot, but they don't feel too tight or too loose. I like that they come up a bit higher than the typical work boot. I appreciate the style a lot, local stores have a poor selection for women's work boots. Cute and practical.
customer_reviews.author: EG.Wheezy

customer_reviews.text: These are the best pair of work boots I have ever bought. They fit my feet perfectly!!! Don't change a thing. Make low and mid calf boots just like these. I will buy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The color is more periwinkle blue, I was hoping more purple (my fault) comfortable on foot/ankle, sturdy, not clunky. I returned bc of color.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable lightweight steel-toed boots I've ever worn! The first day I wore them at work I felt like I've had them for 10 years! Best money spent on a pair of work boots! Of course everybody's foot is shaped different, I wouldn't listen to the negative reviews. I really love these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Krumm

customer_reviews.title: Great durable, comfortable boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Holding up well to lots of abuse. Comfortable, durable, actually waterproof (doesn’t just claim to be). Best boots for women I’ve been able to find!
customer_reviews.author: ALB

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for women with average to narrow feet!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good option for women's steel toe for normal to narrow feet! Had a real hard time finding anything narrow enough (and not pink) and these seem nice and sturdy so far. Could use a little extra arch support but comfortable right out of the box. The gray color is a little more purple than anticipated but still relatively neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase. Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are probably the best pair I have gotten. They are a lot lighter than others I have ordered. They have nice padding in the heel and I like the padded tongue. I like how high they go up too. I would recommend wearing a couple pair of socks at first. I did start getting a blister after one wear. Nothing bad though. Also I got a size 7 1/2 and they fit perfectly the way I like.
customer_reviews.author: FricaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for work in a factory. Very very comfortable, not too heavy. Durable boot even in the harsh conditions of work. On my feet all day and never have sore/uncomfortable feet. Would buy again. Probably not ideal for hot summer conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Nice look 4 a working girl
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. Moderate time to 'break-in'. Shed water extremely well. Not too heavy for a lady to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pasley

customer_reviews.title: Actually cute for heavy duty boots!!
customer_reviews.text: It for perfectly. Had to get used to the weight. But once broken in, they were great!
customer_reviews.author: CRD

product_meta.title: Caterpillar Women's Echo Waterproof Steel Toe Work Boot
product_meta.description:
A comfortable durable work boot with style that will make you wonder if it is just for work. Featuring our i-tec outsole technology for long lasting comfort. Waterproof upper keeps your feet dry in any wet conditions.

As the world's foremost manufacturer of heavy equipment, Cat earthmovers are known around the world as a symbol of honest work, strength and integrity. Cat Footwear makes boots and shoes based on these same principals. The brand has evolved from work boots into a range of industrial and casual footwear built with the sole purpose of staying true to their original goal--creating genuine, hard-working boots and shoes.
feature_bullets: PU Foam Footbed for cushioning comfort
